cool-under-pressure.label: Cool Under Pressure
cool-under-pressure.description: May spend 1 Adversity Token to take half of your die's value instead of rolling on a Snap Decision.

easygoing.label: Easygoing
easygoing.description: Gain 2 Adversity Tokens when you fail, instead of 1.

gross.label: Gross
gross.description: You have some kind of gross bodily trick (loud, quiet, smelly... up to you) that you can do on command.

heroic.label: Heroic
heroic.description: You do not need the GM's permission to spend Adversity Tokens to ignore fears.

intuitive.label: Intuitive
intuitive.description: May spend 1 Adversity Token to ask the GM about your surroundings, an NPC, or the like. The GM must answer honestly.

loyal.label: Loyal
loyal.description: Each of the Adversity Tokens you spend to help your friends gives them a +2 instead of a +1. Lucky May spend 2 Adversity Tokens to reroll a stat check.

prepared.label: Prepared
prepared.description: May spend 2 Adversity Tokens to just happen to have one commonplace item with you (GM's discretion).

protective.label: Protective
protective.description: Add +3 to rolls when defending one of your friends.

quick-healing.label: Quick Healing
quick-healing.description: You recover from injuries more quickly, and don't suffer lasting effects from most injuries.

rebellious.label: Rebellious
rebellious.description: Add +3 to rolls when persuading or resisting persuasion from children.Add + 3 to rolls when resisting persuasion from adults.

skilled-at.label: Skilled at
skilled-at.description: Choose a skill(GM's discretion).You are assumed to succeed when making even moderately difficult checks(9 or less) involving this skill.If the GM determines that you do need to roll for a more difficult check, add up to +3 to your roll.

tough.label: Tough
tough.description: If you lose a combat roll, add +3 to the negative number.You still lose the roll no matter what, but could reduce your loss to -1.

treasure-hunter.label: Treasure Hunter
treasure-hunter.description: May spend 1 Adversity Token to find a useful item in your surroundings.

unassuming.label: Unassuming
unassuming.description: May spend 2 Adversity Tokens to not be seen, within reason (GM's discretion).

wealthy.label: Wealthy
wealthy.description: May spend money as though you were in a higher age bracket. For example, a wealthy child is considered to have the disposable income of a typical teen, and a wealthy teen is considered to have the disposable income of a typical adult. A wealthy adult is considered to not have to worry too much about money â€” they would certainly be able to buy anything they need, and likely able to spend their way out of a lot of situations.
